VelmaStartups.properties.notesText:
HJA_WS10_Recal_8-27-15a <-- HJA_WS10_Recal_8-26-15a - changed "Run Simulator From 1969 to 2008" --> "Run Simulator From 1969 to 2007" (because 2008 observed Q files ends on October 1, 2008) ====================== HJA_WS10_Recal_8-26-15a <-- HJA_WS10_Recal_8-25-15c - simulated Q exceeds obs Q (NSE = 0.79, so try petParam1 = 0.28 = 0.31 (this should decrease simQ) - useEtUptake = true = false (false turns off rbm's ET-based plant water uptake limiter and turns on Feifei's) - Turn on transpriationLimiter and calibrate to Moore et al. 2004 (see "HJA ET RECOVERY_TRANSPIRATION LIMITER_8-19-2015 v5.xlsx") - useTranspirationLimiter = false = true - transpriationLimiterJdayOn = 0 = 152 (June 1) - transpriationLimiterJdayOff = 0 = 273 (September 30) - transpriationLimiterCoeffA = 0.52 - transpriationLimiterCoeffB = 0.0000010 - transpriationLimiterCoeffC = 0.00060 - transpriationLimiterCoeffD = 0.48
==================== HJA_WS10_Recal_8-25-15c <-- HJA_WS10_Recal_8-25-15b - Reset "Soil Ks Values" to "WS10_Recalibration_3-4-14a.xml" - setSoilLayerThicknesses = blank = 300, 750, 750, 200 (from Abdelnour et al. 2011) *Note that when these values are entered the setSoilLayerWeights params are ignored - surfaceKs = 600 (no change) - ksv = 0.0013 (no change) - ksl = 0.00155 (no change) - setSoilLayerThicknesses = blank = 300, 750, 750, 200 (from Abdelnour et al. 2011) *Note that when these values are entered the setSoilLayerWeights params are ignored ==================================== HJA_WS10_Recal_8-2515b <-- HJA_WS10_Recal_8-25-15a - Reset Core PET and ET parameters to "WS10_Recalibration_3-4-14a.xml" - be = 5.10165125702353 = 10.0 - petParam1 = 0.033353589021732 = 0.28 - petParam2 = 0.622 (no change) ======================== HJA_WS10_Recal_8-25-15a <-- WS10wMashelParams_8-25-15a - Reroute output to: C:/Users/bmckane/Documents/SiVELMA Apps/Output/BlueRiver_Results/WS10_Recal_Aug2015 - Update ET recovery params based on "HJA ET RECOVERY_TRANSPIRATION LIMITER_8-19-2015 v5.xlsx" - etRecoveryFractionSlope = 0.0055 = 0.0016 - etRecorveryFractionMinimumValue = 0.3 = 0.3 (no change) -etRecorveryFractionMinimumLeafBiomassC = 0 = 287.0 -etRecoveryFractionIntercept = 0.1908 = -0.16 (must include negative sign with VELMA xml param value)
=============================== WS10wMashelParams_8-25-15a <-- KevinWS10wMashelParams5-18-15a - Test run !!! Test simulation ran to completion for 1969 - 2008. Harvest occured in 1975 as expected. Need to update ET params !!! ====================================== KevinWS10wMashelParams5-18-15a <-- SimulationConfiguration.xml - Revised path to output: C:/Users/bmckane/Documents/SiVELMA Apps/Output/BlueRiver_Results/WS10_May2015 - Change path to input folder and input folder name: C:/Users/bmckane/Documents/SiVELMA Apps/Input/1_BlueRiver_Study BlueRiver_WS10 ====================================== 2015-5-18 Derived from BlueRiver_WS10_Humus_2015-1-15a Imported parameters from Mashel_30m_fromMOEA_rbm_5-14-2015a.xml. This config is meant to cross-test Mashel/MOEA parameters at the Blue River WS10 site. It uses the Blue River drivers and default weather model. It does NOT intialize-by-map, as the Mashel/MOEA config does.
Here are the modified parameters: Existing Parameter "/cover/Cover1_Conifer.properties/transpirationLimiterJdayOff value changed from "273" to "366" Existing Parameter "/cover/Cover1_Conifer.properties/petParam1 value changed from "0.28" to "0.033353589021732" Existing Parameter "/cover/Cover1_Conifer.properties/etRecoveryFractionSlope value changed from "0.0013" to "0.0055" Existing Parameter "/cover/Cover1_Conifer.properties/etRecoveryFractionIntercept value changed from "0.0161" to "0.1908" Existing Parameter "/cover/Cover1_Conifer.properties/transpirationLimiterJdayOn value changed from "152" to "1" Existing Parameter "/cover/Cover1_Conifer.properties/transpirationLimiterCoeffD value changed from "0.65" to "1" Existing Parameter "/cover/Cover1_Conifer.properties/transpirationLimiterCoeffC value changed from "0.00091" to "0" Existing Parameter "/cover/Cover1_Conifer.properties/transpirationLimiterCoeffB value changed from "0.000006" to "0" Existing Parameter "/cover/Cover1_Conifer.properties/transpirationLimiterCoeffA value changed from "0.35" to "0" Existing Parameter "/cover/Cover1_Conifer.properties/transpirationLimiterMaxTotalBiomassC value changed from "42000.0" to "0" Existing Parameter "/calibration/VelmaCalibration.properties/useEtUptake value changed from "false" to "true" Existing Parameter "/calibration/VelmaCalibration.properties/maxSnowMeltSpatialDisplay value changed from "60.0" to "24.0" Existing Parameter "/calibration/VelmaCalibration.properties/be value changed from "10.0" to "5.10165125702353" Parameters Specified=13 Skipped=0 Added=0 Changed=13 Ignored=0
2015-1-15 Added new Soil-specific Humus @Calibration params, set to same values as Cover1 (conifer) Humus params values.
2015-1-15 BlueRiver_WS10_Humus_2015-1-15a <-- BlueRiver_WS10_Full_2013-12-03a Xml converted via FixupChemLossParams.jar utility tool. Set Nash-Sutcliffe Coeff. Changed results location to C: from E:
